item.title: AllusionX - Thriving for Perfection [317] [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Shanks Shanks
item.description:
@Shanks wrote:

[quote=“Nice Boots, post:8, topic:453539”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=556380.msg4073800#msg4073800 date=1344614333]
Here’s a suggestion:

Change coder to programmer.
[/quote]

same damn thing …[/quote]

No, coder is what 13 year old kids call themselves. Programmer is a much more professional term to use if your serious about what your doing. Because you are programming, not coding.

OT: Good luck dude.

Read full topic
